word_mean: 界面：化学上指异相体系中两相之间的界面
又称“接触面”。两个或多个不同物相之间的分界面。如气/水界面。
由两侧特性所定义的共享边界。接口可以在物理级、在软件级或作为纯逻辑运算来描述。

encyclopedia.content: interface是面向对象编程语言中接口操作的关键字，功能是把所需成员组合起来，以封装一定功能的集合。它好比一个模板，在其中定义了对象必须实现的成员，通过类或结构来实现它。接口不能直接实例化，即ICount ic=new iCount()是错的。接口不能包含成员的任何代码，只定义成员本身。接口成员的具体代码由实现接口的类提供。接口使用interface关键字进行声明。

entry.tran: (学科或系统间相互影响或衔接的)边缘区域,接合部位
entry.def: The interface between two subjects or systems is the area in which they affect each other or have links with each other.

example.ex: ...a witty exploration of that interface between bureaucracy and the working world.
example.tran: 对官僚阶层与劳动大众之间的临界区域的风趣探究

entry.def: If you refer to the user interface of a particular piece of computing software, you are talking about its presentation on screen and how easy it is to operate.

example.tran: 更友好的用户界面的开发

entry.def: In computing and electronics, an interface is an electrical cricuit which links one machine, especially a computer, with another.
If one thing interfaces with another, or if two things interface, they have connections with each other. If you interface one thing with another, you connect the two things.

example.ex: ...the way we interface with the environment...
example.tran: 我们与环境相互作用的方式

example.ex: The different components all have to interface smoothly...
example.tran: 不同的部件都必须能顺利接合。

means.word_mean: 1. (chemistry) a surface forming a common boundary between two things (two objects or liquids or chemical phases)
2. (computer science) a program that controls a display for the user (usually on a computer monitor) and that allows the user to interact with the system
3. the overlap where two theories or phenomena affect each other or have links with each other;
4. (computer science) computer circuit consisting of the hardware and associated circuitry that links one device with another (especially a computer and a hard disk drive or other peripherals)

stems_affixes.word_buile: facet[n.[问题等的]侧面,一面;[多面体的]面]+ious……的→做事表面化→轻浮的

efface[v.擦掉,抹去]+ment表名词→n.抹消, 抹杀
face脸,面→n.脸,面貌;表情;正面 v.面对着;朝,面向

sentences.en: My computer has a network interface, which allows me to get to other computers.
sentences.cn: 我的计算机有网络接口可以与其它计算机连在一起。

sentences.en: The new version of the program comes with a much better user interface than original.
sentences.cn: 新版程序的用户界面比原来程序的好得多。

jushi.english: My computer has a network interface,which allows me to get to other computers.
jushi.chinese: 我的计算机有网络接口，可以与其他计算机连在一起。

jushi.english: The new version of the program comes with a much better user interface than the original.
jushi.chinese: 新版程序的用户界面比原来程序的好得多。
